There's a lot of changes in this version! Get ready for:
- Get unlimited access to all books in the Bookful library with our new subscriptions!
- New books and updated reading experiences
- New and improved Paint
- Updates and improvements to Spell It
- Bug fixes and overall improvements

If you have any feedback, please be in touch!
Send us an email at support@inceptionxr.com

- Books from top brands have joined our library! The Smurfs, My Little Pony, Transformers, Horace & Co, and more!
- Bookful is now personalized for your child. Choose your reading level and interests and edit as you wish in the parent zone.
- Check out the new personal area where you can view your creations and reading progression.
- Be the storyteller! Now you can record books in your own voice and listen to your recording.

We are constantly updating the app and making changes to improve your Bookful experience!
If you have any feedback, please be in touch.
Please send us an email at support@inceptionxr.com

- Books from top brands have joined our library! The Smurfs, My Little Pony, Transformers, Horace & Co, and more!
- Bookful is now personalized for your child. Choose your reading level and interests and edit as you wish in the parent zone.
- Check out the new personal area where you can view your creations and reading progression.
- Be the storyteller! Now you can record books in your own voice and listen to your recording.

- NEW BOOKS have joined the Augmented Reality Bookful library! The Smurfs, My Little Pony, Transformers, Horace & Co, and more!
- New badges have been added to the Adventure Book!
- Find more information on your child's reading progression in the Parent Zone.
- Be the storyteller! Now you can record books in your own voice and listen to your recording.

- Thomas the Tank Engine has joined the Bookful library! Check out all-time favorite titles in Augmented Reality!
- Introducing the NEW Bookful Avatar! Collect stars by completing books and games and start personalizing your Avatar!
- Enjoy best selling titles from leading publishers such as Oxford University Press, DK, Penguin Random House, and many more!
- Get creative in Bookful's Augmented Reality paint game. New characters are now available!
- Want to experience the story from within? Enter the book world of laughing Girrafe and explore the Savannah! Exclusively for 5G and WIFI users.

- Enjoy best selling titles from leading publishers such as Oxford University Press, DK, Penguin Random House, and many more!
- Kids 3-8 enjoy a variety of books and educational activities personalized to their age and interests.

- Smurftastic news! Our favorite blue characters are back with fun titles and games.

- Get creative in Bookful's Augmented Reality paint game. New characters are now available!

User experience and performance enhancements.

-NEW BOOK ALERT! PEPPA PIG books have joined the library! Check our popular titles in AR!
-Additional titles added such as “Guinea Pigs Go Gardening”, and references books such as “History’s Marvelous Mistake” about Alexander Fleming, the Kellog Brothers, and more
--New characters have been added to your kid’s favorite Paint game, where you can bring your favorite characters to life!
-Plus. . .you can now delete your creations from the personal area
-AND enjoy a smoother experience, with enhanced navigation and performance
